SOL.description: Solarium: A versatile and universal currency also considered the main currency of the galaxy.

TF.description: Techforge: Used to create and upgrade buildings.

POP.description: Population: Number of people currently owned.

INF.description: Influence: Used to make political decisions.

MI.description: Minerals: Used as a resource for various industrial processes.

UR.description: Uranium: Used for energy production and nuclear technologies.

OI.description: Oil: Used as a primary energy source and for manufacturing various products.

CO.description: Coal: Used primarily as a fuel source for energy generation.
